name: Unstable World (BankShotZombies)
description:
You find out that the world has been taken over by an alien species. The aliens have broken the Rock of Stability, and weird phenomena have been occurring ever since. Can you find all the parts of the Staff of Restoration and fix the Rock of Stability before its too late? Or will the powerful enemy overpower you? There's only one way to find out!

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 49 game jam.
